details.example: Asymmetric Private Key Found SSH and/or x.509 Cerficates among the files of your project, make sure you want this kind of information inside your Git repo, since it can be missused by someone with access to any kind of copy.  For more information checkout the CWE-312 (https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/312.html) advisory.
